hotels.name: Luura
hotels.desc: Culturally-immersive boutique hotel, design-focused, authentic local experience
hotels.longDesc: An Ugandan boutique property offering cultural immersion through thoughtful design. Prioritizes local authenticity and character over conventional luxury amenities.
hotels.address: Plot 3, Kitante Close, Yusuf Lule Road, Kampala, Uganda

hotels.name: Kampala Serena Hotel
hotels.desc: Luxury 5-star hotel, lush gardens, fine dining, spa, family suites
hotels.longDesc: A stunning lakeside luxury hotel in Kampala's heart with beautifully appointed rooms, multiple restaurants, and excellent facilities for families seeking comfort and elegance.

hotels.name: Rwenzori View Guesthouse
hotels.desc: Boutique hotel, authentic African design, mountain views, cultural experiences
hotels.longDesc: A charming boutique hotel offering authentic Ugandan hospitality with traditional architecture, mountain views, and personalized service perfect for families exploring western Uganda.
hotels.address: Lower Kakiiza Road Boma, Fort Portal, Uganda

hotels.name: Nile Safari Lodge
hotels.desc: Safari resort overlooking Nile, wildlife viewing, adventure activities, spacious tents
hotels.longDesc: A scenic safari lodge with panoramic Nile views, comfortable accommodations, and direct access to wildlife viewing and boat tours, ideal for adventurous families.

hotels.name: Primate Lodge
hotels.desc: Eco-lodge near Kibale Forest, chimpanzee trekking access, nature trails, comfortable rooms
hotels.longDesc: An intimate eco-lodge nestled near Kibale National Park, offering direct access to world-class chimpanzee trekking and immersive forest experiences for wildlife-loving families.

restaurants.name: CafÃ© Javas
restaurants.desc: Casual coffee shop, fresh pastries, light meals, WiFi, warm atmosphere
restaurants.longDesc: A beloved local cafÃ© chain serving excellent coffee, fresh baked goods, and light lunches. Perfect for families needing a comfortable spot to relax and recharge.
restaurants.address: Opposite post office, Kampala Road, Kampala, Uganda

restaurants.name: Nile Breweries Depot
restaurants.desc: Brewery restaurant, craft beers, grilled meats, riverside views, lively vibe
restaurants.longDesc: A popular riverside brewery restaurant featuring craft beers, delicious grilled specialties, and a relaxed family-friendly atmosphere with great views of the Nile.

restaurants.name: Fang Fang Suites (BELFORD GARDEN HOTEL AND RESTUARANT)
restaurants.desc: Fine dining Chinese cuisine, elegant setting, private dining, exceptional service
restaurants.longDesc: An upscale Chinese restaurant offering expertly prepared dishes in an elegant atmosphere, perfect for a special family dinner with attentive service and refined ambiance.

restaurants.name: Katende Pork Joint Makindye
restaurants.desc: Local grilled pork restaurant, authentic Ugandan flavors, casual setting, affordable
restaurants.longDesc: A vibrant local eatery serving deliciously grilled pork and traditional Ugandan sides. Affordable, authentic, and popular with families seeking genuine local cuisine.
restaurants.address: I 8634, 20c Haji Abasi Kabuye Rd, Kampala, Uganda

restaurants.name: Pakuba Safari lodge
restaurants.desc: Evening dining with sunset over the Nile and traditional Ugandan cuisine
restaurants.address: Gulu - Arua Rd Murchison Falls National Park, Uganda

restaurants.name: The Lawns Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Upscale restaurant at Speke Resort Munyonyo with garden seating and international cuisine
restaurants.address: 3a Lower Kololo Terrace Rd, Kampala, Uganda

restaurants.name: Paraa Safari Lodge
restaurants.desc: Main dining restaurant at Paraa Safari Lodge overlooking the Nile

restaurants.name: Boomu Women's Group
restaurants.desc: Community restaurant near Murchison Falls offering local Ugandan dishes

restaurants.name: Mediterraneo Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Italian restaurant in Kampala known for wood-fired pizzas and pasta

restaurants.name: Piato Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Contemporary restaurant in Kampala offering international and Ugandan fusion cuisine

restaurants.name: Entebbe Zoo Rhino Restaurant, Bar and Beach
restaurants.desc: Onsite cafe at the wildlife center with family-friendly meals
restaurants.address: Inside UWEC Entebbe Zoo, 57 Lugard Ave, Entebbe, Uganda

restaurants.name: Khana Khazana
restaurants.desc: Popular Indian restaurant in Kampala serving authentic North Indian cuisine
restaurants.address: Plot 20 Acacia Avenue/21528, John Babiha (Acacia) Ave, Kampala, Uganda

restaurants.name: Murchison falls cafe
restaurants.desc: Packed lunch from lodge enjoyed at scenic viewpoint

restaurants.name: BAKERM ENTERPRISES
restaurants.desc: Bakery and restaurant in nearby Masindi town serving meals and baked goods

restaurants.name: Dutchess Hotel and Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Restaurant in Fort Portal near Kibale offering continental and local cuisine

restaurants.name: Gardens Restaurant, CafÃ¨, Art Gallery
restaurants.desc: Garden restaurant in Fort Portal with outdoor seating and varied menu
restaurants.address: M74H+W6Q, Kabundaire Rd, Fort Portal, Uganda

experiences.name: Uganda Museum
experiences.desc: National museum, cultural artifacts, ethnographic displays, interactive exhibits
experiences.longDesc: Uganda's premier museum showcasing the country's rich cultural heritage through extensive collections of artifacts, traditional crafts, and informative displays that educate and inspire.
experiences.address: Plot 5 Old Kira Road, after Mulago Referral Hospital, Kitante Cl, Kampala, Uganda

experiences.name: Murchison Falls National Park
experiences.desc: Dramatic waterfall, safari game drives, Nile boat cruises, abundant wildlife viewing
experiences.longDesc: Uganda's largest national park featuring the spectacular Murchison Falls, diverse wildlife, scenic landscapes, and unforgettable safari adventures suitable for the entire family.

experiences.name: Kibale National Park
experiences.desc: Chimpanzee trekking, rainforest walks, primate research center, guided tours
experiences.longDesc: Famous for incredible chimpanzee trekking experiences, Kibale's pristine rainforest offers families close encounters with primates and immersive nature walks in a protected ecosystem.

experiences.name: Kasubi Tombs
experiences.desc: UNESCO World Heritage Site, royal burial grounds, cultural significance, guided tours
experiences.longDesc: A sacred UNESCO World Heritage Site housing the tombs of Buganda kings. The site offers profound insights into Ugandan royal traditions and cultural heritage through guided experiences.

experiences.name: Ndere Cultural Centre
experiences.desc: Cultural center showcasing Ugandan traditional music, dance, and cultural performances in Kampala
experiences.address: Plot 4505 Kira Rd, Ntinda - Kisaasi Rd, Kampala, Uganda

experiences.name: Murchison Falls tourist attraction
experiences.desc: Scenic viewpoint at the top of Murchison Falls where the Nile forces through a narrow gorge

kidFriendly.name: Uganda Wildlife Conservation Education Centre
kidFriendly.desc: Uganda's only zoo, diverse wildlife, walking trails, picnic areas, educational programs
kidFriendly.longDesc: A delightful zoo featuring African animals, well-maintained habitats, educational exhibits, and peaceful grounds. Perfect for children to learn about and observe Uganda's diverse wildlife.
kidFriendly.address: Plot 56/57 Lugard Avenue, Johnston Rd, Entebbe, Uganda

markets.name: Owino Market/Kampala
markets.desc: Historic central market, local produce, crafts, fabrics, vibrant cultural experience
markets.longDesc: Kampala's bustling traditional market brimming with colorful produce, handmade crafts, fabrics, and local goods. An authentic cultural immersion offering genuine Ugandan marketplace atmosphere.

a.name: Uganda Family Safari & Culture (10 Days)
a.description: An unforgettable blend of wildlife encounters, primate tracking, and cultural discovery designed for families with young childrenâ€”where every day balances adventure with plenty of downtime.
